title: How many pages is 30 minutes in a script? - Quora

response.answer_text: The general approximation is 1 page equals 1 minute of video time. This, of course, depends on what one is shooting. If there’s a lot of scenery, say shots of vehicles arriving somewhere, car chases, running, fights, then that could change greatly because “sword fight up and down stairway” could equate to several minutes of actual fighting. But, as a general rule of thumb, 1 page = 1 minute.
